m_szDocTitle: Why Tesla's Model 3 Rush May Signal Boom Times for Mozambique Mine - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- TheStreet Markets Today Why Tesla's Model 3 Rush May Signal Boom Times for Mozambique Mine With emerging markets in a swoon, a Standard Life fund manager is betting on a boom -- in stocks of electric-vehicle parts and battery makers. Bradley Keoun Apr 6, 2016 9:44 AM EDT There are probably more stocks like Tesla ( TSLA )  out there. Like, way out there -- in default-prone investing realms like Mozambique. That's the conviction of Mark Vincent, an emerging-markets specialist at the $373 billion money manager Standard Life Investments ( SLFPF ) . He's hitched his
